name: The Bean to Bliss Kit
description:
When your coffee goes the extra mile, you don’t toss it away! We’ve teamed up with zero-waste champions, at Bare Necessities, to transform our spent coffee grounds into a revitalising coffee body scrub and gently exfoliating soap bar, that moisturise and nourish the skin. Packed with clean, transparent ingredients, these skincare products not only shield your skin from free radicals but also elevate your everyday skincare routine.

The hamper includes  a Coffee Spa Bar, Coffee Scrub, Lip Balm, ARAKU Leaf Mug, Four Pocket Brew Sachets, and an ARAKU badge.
